getBillingManagerClass

public Class<? extends BillingManager> getBillingManagerClass()

onPurchased

public void onPurchased(PurchaseOrder order)
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when an item is purchased. It is the callback invoked in response to calling BillingManager.requestPurchase(Purchasable, String). It may also be invoked asynchronously when a purchase is made on another device (if the purchase was for a Market-managed item).

Specified by:
onPurchased in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onPurchased(com.jdroid.android.billing.PurchaseOrder)

onCanceled

public void onCanceled(PurchaseOrder order)
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when an item is canceled. It is the callback invoked in response to calling BillingManager.requestPurchase(Purchasable, String). It may also be invoked asynchronously when the charge was canceled.

Specified by:
onCanceled in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onCanceled(com.jdroid.android.billing.PurchaseOrder)

onRefunded

public void onRefunded(PurchaseOrder order)
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when an item is refunded. It is the callback invoked in response to calling BillingManager.requestPurchase(Purchasable, String). It may also be invoked asynchronously when the purchase was refunded.

Specified by:
onRefunded in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onRefunded(com.jdroid.android.billing.PurchaseOrder)

onBillingSupported

public void onBillingSupported()
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when the Google Play app responds to the BillingManager.checkBillingSupported() request and in-app billing is supported.

Specified by:
onBillingSupported in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onBillingSupported()

onBillingNotSupported

public void onBillingNotSupported()
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when the Google Play app responds to the BillingManager.checkBillingSupported() request and in-app billing is not supported.

Specified by:
onBillingNotSupported in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onBillingNotSupported()

isBillingSupported

public Boolean isBillingSupported()

onGooglePlayConnectionError

public void onGooglePlayConnectionError()
Description copied from interface: BillingListener
This is the callback that is invoked when the Google Play app responds to the BillingManager.checkBillingSupported() request and there was an error connecting with the Google Play app.

Specified by:
onGooglePlayConnectionError in interface BillingListener
See Also:
BillingListener.onGooglePlayConnectionError()
